description: A good burger doesn't have to be fancy. I took simple whole food ingredients to create this amazing vegan chickpea burger that can be paired with anything!
keywords: easy burger recipe, healthy burger recipe
name: Vegan Chickpea Burgers
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 cups cooked chickpeas (, drained and rinsed (about one 15 ounce can)
1/2 cup rolled oats (, gluten-free if needed)
1/2 cup chopped red or yellow onion
1-2 tablespoons mayo/sour cream/yogurt/sauce of choice (, see note)
1/2 -1 teaspoon sea salt (, depends on the sauce and how salty it is)
Buns of choice (, or lettuce leaves for low carb version)
Extra sauce that you used above

recipeInstructions.text: Add everything to a food processor and pulse until the mixture is in small crumbles and sticks together well.
Cook on a preheated griddle or pan for 5-6 minutes on each side or until brown.
You can also bake them on a parchment lined baking sheet at 350 F/ 175 C for about 15 minutes on each side.
Allow to cool a bit before eating. This will help keep the burgers together without falling apart.
